text: Ghilarza (Ilàrtzi) is a town and a comune (municipality) in the Province of Oristano in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 4,481 people lived there. Its area is 55.46 km². It is 290 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Oristano
title: Ghilarza
